header.contentHeader: We believe that engagement will create positive changes in society, impulse justice in the reach of resources to create a sustainable development.

Body.contentAboutUs: Soc Trang Center For Social Science Engagement (SCSE) is a non-governmental organization operating in social science, under Soc Trang Union of Science and Technology Associations.
Body.contentGoal: We believe that connectivity will create positive changes in society, impulse fairness in access to resources, and contribute to sustainable development.
Body.contentVision: SCSE believes that the right connection will create positive changes in society, promote internal strength and increase opportunities to access resources and contribute to sustainable community development.
Body.contentMission: SCSE's mission is to connect resources in society to ensure equal access and development opportunities for disadvantaged groups in society based on science and professional assistance.

Footer.content1: We are not the ones who make change, but we can engage different resources. This can contribute to the change in society, and create a better life.

Story.Content1: Derived from fragments of the past, childhood is incomplete, happy like many other children, working hard, helping the family from an early age,... But, it's not just a personal story, but a personal story. was the general situation of children in Soc Trang province at that time. Think of yourself and then think of others! Bringing the desire to help more children, educate sex and popularize social knowledge for people and Khmer ethnic minorities in the province,... From there, a journey has been started. to love!
Story.Content2: Going with good beliefs, besides the desire to further improve the quality of life of the people of the province in general and the Khmer people in Soc Trang in particular, the popularization of social knowledge, the on Gender and Gender Equality, LGBTQ+ Community, environment, education,... Soc Trang Provincial Community Connection Center carries on its good responsibilities, with the desire that more and more children and women Women and young people have gradually improved their health status, family and social problems. Hope to bring useful knowledge and activities to help them become more optimistic, stronger and more integrated with the community.
Story.MKKVDV: A WISHING FOR THOUSANDS OF THINGS BECAUSE
Story.Content3: Thirteen years of rekindling the idea, Ms. Huong, coming out of the ups and downs of her life with the desire to establish a Community Connection Center in the province, was fortunate to find great partners. Starting from the impressive self. Ms. Huong - an active member of the Soc Trang Province Women's Association; Mr. Giang - a teacher with a great heart, has found a lot of faith in his teammates, but perhaps the most common thing in them personally is the desire to establish a Community Connection Center in the province for the sake of life. People's lives here have been somewhat improved, because to see more children going to school, all of them are loved and happy.

Donate.ContentTop: Soc Trang Social Science Service Connection Center (SCSE) is a non-governmental organization operating in the field of social sciences, affiliated to the Union of Science and Technology Associations of Soc Trang Province.

ContentMid.TTKND: SOCIAL SCIENCE SERVICE CONNECTION CENTER SOC TRANG (SCSE)

Donate.ContentBot: * Statements and guarantees We guarantee that the money donated by the donors will be used for the legitimate purposes and for the purpose of the organization's activities. In addition, the money that has been donated is non-refundable and becomes the property of SCSE. *

CSBM.Content: At SCSE Foundation, we take privacy very seriously. We are committed to protecting the privacy of our program beneficiaries, sponsors and supporters, and anyone else who interacts with us. This Privacy Policy applies to the SCSE Organization. SCSE collects, uses and stores personal information to assist us in our work of helping people in need. Disclosure of this information is made only under very strict limitations and never to third parties without your consent.
